text.div:
ConceptMap_v2-0315_Map (http://hl7.org/fhir/v2-tofhir)

Mapping from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0315 to http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0315

ACTIVE (not intended for production usage). Published on Mar 1, 2020, 12:00:00 AM by HL7 International (HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/v2-to-FHIR+IG, Keith W. Boone: kboone@ainq.com). Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 Table v2-0315 to the FHIR Living Will Value Set.


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
Yis equivalent toY
Fis equivalent toF
Nis equivalent toN
Iis equivalent toI
Uis equivalent toU

name: ConceptMap_v2-0315_Map
description: This ConceptMap represents the mapping from the HL7 V2 Table v2-0315 to the FHIR Living Will Value Set.

element.display: Yes, patient has a living will

target.display: Yes, patient has a living will

element.display: Yes, patient has a living will but it is not on file

target.display: Yes, patient has a living will but it is not on file

element.display: No, patient does not have a living will and no information was provided

target.display: No, patient does not have a living will and no information was provided

element.display: No, patient does not have a living will but information was provided

target.display: No, patient does not have a living will but information was provided
